title: If we reverted every champion back to their release power, who would we be asking for to be nerfed?
body:
Also, who would need some major buffs?

I feel like release Xin would probably be perma-banned.

Then again.... TF DID ult where he pleased.

replies.body:
{{champion:75}} 

let's pretend for a moment you have 0 mag res. If nasus proceeds to get 100 AP then every second you stand near him while he's ulting you lose 100% of your health.

I feel that everyone is forgetting that {{champion:24}} was so OP on release Riot actually had to REMOVE HIM FROM THE GAME. Only to re-release him with less Power. Sure Xin was bad, but Jax was worse.

{{champion:24}} 
And you thought you were safe in the fountain.

There's a few options:
{{champion:5}} - Intercontinental Ballistic Missile. If he sees you, he will fly all the way across the rift to strike you into oblivion. Counterplay? Don't get in range.
Rumor has it that this guy can 1 v 1 towers without minions.

{{champion:157}} - Because 400 damage on a 6 second CD ability (Sweeping blade) at level 1 totally makes sense. As well, 690 HP shield every 2 seconds (or 4 Es) is also pretty balanced on top of his 2x crit chance and 50% armor penetration.

{{champion:7}} - If you don't want to die to Yasuo at level 1, LB will guarantee to kill you at level 2. Her mana bar can afford her more burst than your health bar.

{{champion:119}} - Bleeds, bleeds everywhere.

{{champion:75}} - Literally the God of Death. He ults, you die.

{{champion:29}} - 50 second Stealth... really?

{{champion:28}} - Permanent Stealth -_-. Imagine her running you down with 6 {{item:3068}} while you can't see her.

Irelia isn't OP?
Better nerf Irelia.
